info.title: Time Tracker API Tool
info.description: A RESTful API to help freelancers track time spent on projects and generate work summaries. Create, delete, make tasks and log time onto projects and get the summary of the project in a downloadable CSV File using this tool!

example.messgae: Welcome to the time tracker API!
example.description: A RESTful API to help freelancers track time spent on projects and generate work summaries. Create, update, and delete projects, tasks, and timestamps.

Name.description: The full name of the user.

Email_ID.description: The email address of the user. Must be unique.

user_id.description: The user id of the user.
